main event: A power company lineman reported a spherical object with a bright blue-green glow hovering approximately 50-60 feet above the ground in East Dennis, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The object was described as being about the size of a mercury liquid droplet,The sighting lasted for 30-40 seconds,The object appeared stationary during the observation,The investigator concluded that the object's characteristics were consistent with an electrically charged corona around high power lines,The object disappeared instantly from the same position as it was sighted.
witness description: power company lineman, high school graduate, reliable
